SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: Covert Note Type Child Bio to type Child Bio Old
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Covert Note Type Child Bio to type Child Bio Old
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Bill Elfstrom
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure [dbo].[USR_USP_CONVERTCHILDBIOTOCHILDBIOOLD] ( @ID uniqueidentifier -- Sponsorship Opportunity Child ID )
as begin
begin try
begin tran /* get the IDs for the type codes */ declare @ChildBioCodeID uniqueidentifier
select @ChildBioCodeID = ID from dbo.SPROPPNOTETYPECODE where lower (DESCRIPTION) = 'child bio' if @ChildBioCodeID is null raiserror('Couldn''t find the "Child Bio" sponsorship opportunity note code',16,1);
declare @ChildBioOldCodeID uniqueidentifier
select @ChildBioOldCodeID = ID from dbo.SPROPPNOTETYPECODE where lower (DESCRIPTION) = 'child bio - old' if @ChildBioOldCodeID is null raiserror('Couldn''t find the "Child Bio - Old" sponsorship opportunity note code',16,1);
update dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYNOTE set SPROPPNOTETYPECODEID = @ChildBioOldCodeID where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = @ID and SPROPPNOTETYPECODEID = @ChildBioCodeID
commit tran end try
begin catch IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 rollback
-- Raise an error with the details of the exception declare @ErrMsg nvarchar(4000), @ErrSeverity int select @ErrMsg = ERROR_MESSAGE(), @ErrSeverity = ERROR_SEVERITY() raiserror(@ErrMsg, @ErrSeverity, 1)
end catch
end
